attributes.action: Re-open the 10 London fire stations closed by Boris Johnson and give the 600 people their jobs back.
attributes.additional_details: In a crazy cost-cutting measure Boris Johnn has closed 10 fire stations in London, throwing 600 firemen and women out of work. In the event of an emergency, it will now take longer for the fire brigade to arrive; there will be less people to attend the emergency; there will be less cover for emergencies. Imagine if 10 police stations had been closed to save costs. This is one measure that MUST be reversed.
